topic.title: Generating a new ZeroID - Error while during request: Forbidden Please try again later.
topic.body:
Anyone else getting this error? I've created an ID, then I move it away, restart ZeroNet, then go to ZeroID type in my new name for the ID and I get: "Error while during request: Forbidden
Please try again later." anyone experiencing this issue?

topic.title: Create unmasker for 0chan?
topic.body: We should create a chrome plugin that displays the name of every user

2_1HK5C3Uf8zvbbSb92ZP6EsfHKC59MXDcK9.body: Does this work for 0chan? Where people can post anon?

> [shadowspeed](#comment_1_1Nj8tKxP4PQsXnUg2fCSwRrykCK7YsgAXx): Well, it's not a big deal. I mean, of course you can see all my comments, blog posts, etc. That's why I wrote them in the first place... right? Anyway, I find it amusing that you call "hacking" looking for a string with grep :P

It does matter because ZeroNet has no accountability, all content posted by anyone can be changed.

You should be able to be fully anon at any time.
